title: Step Configuration
description: All steps should have a defined configuration, this is how you define the step's behavior and how it will be triggered.

title: PUT API Step
description: Definition of a PUT API endpoint for updating an existing pet

title: Path Parameters
description: Using path parameters to capture the pet ID from the URL

title: Request Body Parsing
description: Extract and parse the request body to get update data

title: Conditional Updates
description: Only update fields that are provided and valid in the request

title: Selective Update Logic
description: This step demonstrates selective updating - only the fields provided in the request body are updated. The handler builds a patch object with only valid fields, leaving other pet properties unchanged.

title: Data Validation
description: Validate each field before including it in the update

title: Data Update
description: Update the pet in the store with the validated changes

title: Conditional Response
description: Return different responses based on whether the update was successful

title: Handler
description: The handler function that executes when the PUT request is made

title: HTTP Response
description: Returns appropriate HTTP status codes: 200 for success, 404 for not found
